title: Legacy client broken
body: So I downloaded the new client and that worked out fine. So I run the legacy client it goes to black screen and the menu music is playing so I don't what the problem i did everything to fix it and nothing is changing. I could play on the old fine but as soon as this one came out I can't play now. Plz help ASAP

replies.body: The legacy client has been retired, so it's not possible to access it though I'm curious how you might be getting around to it.  You'll want to continue using the  updated client to play league, but let me know if you have any questions.
When I run the new client. The client goes black and the background music continues to play.I just need help, so that I can the client and continue my wonderful journey  of climbing

Thanks for the clarification!  If you're getting a black screen then you could be having a connection problem reaching our services and downloading assets.  I suggest going through each step in this [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and fix up whatever is causing your connection to degrade.  Let me know if you have any questions!
